job.title: QA Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtSoftware QAAutomation EngineerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for a versatile curious and motivated QA engineer to help define the way we build and test our products in a startup like environment If you are passionate about pioneering new technologies into software testing have your voice and ownership in quality improving product performance security and more we would like to connect with youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe RoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAs a Quality Assurance Engineer QA you will join a team of handson passionate engineers to ensure the highest quality for our products You will help build and own various test frameworks for both the frontend and backend This role is an integral part of creating products with first class user experience as well as sustaining a fastgrowing customer baseltbrgtltulgtltligtReview product requirements and design creative in coming up with test plans and test cases with maximum test coverageltligtltligtWork with developers to understand the overall technical architecture and how each feature is implementedltligtltligtDevelop and own test frameworks for UI API performance and security improve test efficiency and statistics collection ltligtltligtAble to put together automation with various technologies and tools to meet testing requirements ltligtltligtExecute and benchmark performance metrics Monitor application to determine system behaviorltligtltligtPerform manual and automated testsltligtltligtIdentify document and validate system or software defectsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtBasic QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBackground in computer science engineering or similarltligtltligt2 year of experience working as a Quality Assurance EngineerltligtltligtExcellent programming fundamentals with Java Scala andor PythonltligtltligtExperience in automation testingltligtltligtExcellent communication skillsltligtltligtPassionate about learning new technologiesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtExperience with API UI testing with SeleniumltligtltligtExperience with backend performance tooling and framework developmentltligtltligtExperience with measuring and troubleshooting frontend performance metrics using Chrome Dev tools or similarltligtltligtExperience with database testingltligtltligtExperience with AWS or other cloud technologiesltligtltulgt
